sections.title: Athens & Crete: Ancient Wonders & Minoan Delights
sections.content: Begin your Greek Island adventure in Athens, the cradle of Western civilization. Explore the iconic Acropolis, marvel at its architectural wonders, and delve into history at the National Archaeological Museum, home to a breathtaking collection of Greek artifacts. Then, take a scenic flight to Crete. Upon arrival, settle in and prepare for an exploration of Minoan culture. Visit the magnificent Palace of Knossos, the heart of the Minoan civilization, and unravel the mysteries of this ancient society. Conclude your days with a private wine tasting tour in the charming village of Archanes, where you'll savor exquisite local wines amidst picturesque vineyards and breathtaking countryside views. Enjoy a private dinner at a farm-to-table restaurant featuring the best of the Cretan cuisine.

sections.title: Crete: Natural Beauty & Venetian Charm
sections.content: Immerse yourselves in Crete's stunning natural landscapes. Embark on a guided hike through the legendary Samaria Gorge, one of Europe's longest and most spectacular gorges, surrounded by towering cliffs and unique flora and fauna (weather permitting). Afterwards, indulge in relaxation on the idyllic pink sands of Elafonisi beach, known for its crystal-clear turquoise waters. In the evening, experience the romantic ambiance of Chania, a city renowned for its Venetian architecture. Enjoy a candlelit dinner at a seaside restaurant, savoring fresh seafood while overlooking the charming harbor and enjoying live music.

sections.title: Rhodes: Medieval Grandeur & Island Vistas
sections.content: Take a high-speed ferry to Rhodes, the island of the Knights. Step back in time as you explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Medieval Old Town of Rhodes, a labyrinth of cobblestone streets, imposing walls, and grand palaces. Discover the ancient city of Lindos, perched atop a dramatic cliffside, and marvel at the Acropolis of Lindos, offering breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea. Enjoy a private guided hike through the fragrant Orange Valley, a hidden gem of Rhodes, surrounded by citrus groves and stunning natural beauty. Visit the imposing Monolithos Castle, dramatically situated on a rocky outcrop, for panoramic views of the island and coastline. In the evening indulge in a fine dining experience at a top-rated seafood restaurant in Rhodes Town, celebrating the island's rich culinary heritage.

sections.title: Rhodes Relaxation & Farewell Feast
sections.content: Spend your final days exploring the eastern coast of Rhodes, discovering hidden coves and pristine beaches. Indulge in watersports or simply relax and soak up the Mediterranean sun. Visit charming local villages, such as Koskinou or Archangelos, and experience authentic Rhodian life. Take a private cooking class and learn to prepare traditional Greek dishes. Conclude your Greek Island adventure with a memorable farewell dinner in the vibrant city of Rhodes Town. Enjoy a gourmet meal at a top-rated restaurant with views of the harbor, celebrating your journey with exquisite cuisine and local wines before departing.
